#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

int main()
{
	int date, year , mon = 0 , value , val [5] = {0} , i ,temp , temp2, j , temp3 , ans;
	char month[20];
	scanf("%d %s %d" , &date , &month , &year);

	if(strcmp(month , "January") == 0)
       mon = 1;
	if(strcmp( month, "February") == 0)
	   mon = 2;
	if (strcmp( month ,"March") == 0)
	   mon = 3; 
	if (strcmp ( month ,"April") == 0)
	   mon = 4; 
	if ( strcmp ( month , "May") ==0)
	  mon = 5; 
    if (strcmp ( month ,"June") == 0) 
	  mon = 6; 
	if ( strcmp( month , "July") ==0)
	  mon = 7; 
	if (strcmp ( month ,"August") ==0)
	  mon = 8; 
	if (strcmp ( month ,"September") ==0)
	  mon = 9; 
	if (strcmp( month , "October") == 0)
	  mon = 10; 
	if (strcmp ( month , "November") == 0)
	  mon = 11; 
	if ( strcmp( month , "December") == 0)
	  mon = 12; 
	
	value = (date * mon + year);
	do 
    {
	    val [0] = value % 10;
		ans = 0;
	    for (i = 1 ; i < 5 ; i++)	
       {
		 j = i+1;
	     temp2 = pow( 10 , j);
		 temp = value % temp2;
		 temp3 = pow (10 , i);
		 val[i] = temp - val[i-1];
		 val[i] = val[i] / temp3; 
	   }
	   for (i = 0 ; i < 5 ; i++)
	  {
	  	ans = ans + val[i];
	  }
	  
	  value = ans;
    }
    while ( ans/10 >= 1 );
    
    printf("%d" , ans);
    return 0;
	
}
